ProductRelatedMaterial.name: ProductRelatedMaterial
ProductRelatedMaterial.description: Represents information about the components of a product.

Description.description: The description of the product component record.

EffectiveEndDate.description: The date until when the product component is effective.

EffectiveStartDate.description: The date from which the product component is effective.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

LeadTime.description: The lead time required to manufacture the product component.

LeadTimeUomId.description: The unit of measure for the lead time.

ManufacturingProgramId.description: The manufacturing program associated with the Product Related Material.

MinimumEligibleQuantity.description: The minimum quantity of the product component thatâ€™s required to accept the deal.

MinimumEligibleQuantityUomId.description: The unit of measure for the minimum eligible quantity of the product component.

Name.description: The name of the product component record.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this object.

ProductComponentId.description: The unique identifier for the product component.

ProductCpntPricebookId.description: The pricebook entry associated with the Product Related Material.

ProductId.description: The product associated with the component.

QuantityPerProductUnit.description: The number of units of the component required per unit of the product.

QuantityUomId.description: The unit of measure for the component quantity.

UsageCategory.description: Specifies the category of usage for the product component.
